title: WATCH: SA road trips kids should experience before they grow up
text:
YOU MIGHT ALSO LIKE {{item.title}}

When you become a parent, it's easy to put major travel off until the kids are a bit older.

But as South Africans, we live in a country with such exceptional diversity and natural beauty - that road-tripping with the kids is an easy, not-so complicated option. Well for the most part.

From the colourful flowers of the West Coast, to the feathered friends of the Garden Route or the fluffy ones in the Kruger National park - there are options to inspire their adventurous and nature-loving spirits. Watch the video above to see what we mean.

description: We are lucky to live in a country of exceptional diversity and natural beauty - why not introduce your kids?
